value.description: A portable automatic turret made of durable Starsteel and Plasteel. It must be occasionally resupplied with Generation-1 weapon charge.\n\nMax Clip Size: 125 Projectiles

A portable automatic turret made of durable Starsteel and Plasteel. It must be occasionally resupplied with Generation-1 weapon charge.

This variant does not have a burst nor a cooldown between said bursts. Instead, it constantly fires at a steady pace until it runs out of ammo.

Max Clip Size: 125 Projectiles
